name: Awakens
description:
Awakens is a superhero-management simulation game. It takes place in a city that has lost its superhero, Mr. Fortless, and has turned to chaos. Manage a team of heroes called the Awakens to defeat villains and restore peace to the city. 

This game is an alpha version. You can experience the story of chasing Lynx, the villain. And this game does not have save functionality. You can reach the ending in as little as 10 minutes of play time.

Also, since some parts have not been adequately tested, I would appreciate it if you could report any bugs you encounter.
